samples.name: Bandai Figuarts Zero Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Zenitsu Agatsuma (Thunder Flash Ver.)
samples.desc:
Description:-
Zenitsu Agatsuma from Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaibagets a new Figuarts ZERO figure from Bandai, caught at the moment he unleashes his Thunder Flash attack! Clear and partially painted effect parts reproduce the power of his vigorous attack, contrasting with his peaceful expression. This figure is amazing all the way around with skillful sculpting accenting his dynamic pose!
 
Product Features
5.9 inches (15cm)
Made of ABS and PVC
 Based on the Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba anime series
Part of the FiguartsZERO lineup
Highly detailed
Box Contents
Zenitsu Agatsuma figure
